Who is the specific executive sponsor (VP Operations / Plant Director) for the endorsement message and announcement email? Name and title are needed for credibility.
Is there an existing LMS or learning platform where the course will be hosted, and does it support progress tracking and completion reporting?
Are dashboard access logs available to measure consultation frequency, or will a proxy metric (e.g., self-reported usage in pulse survey) be needed?
What is the preferred method for printing and distributing the quick-reference card — does the organization have an internal print capability or does this need to be outsourced?
Are there existing shift-start meeting or huddle routines that supervisors already follow, so the Manager Huddle can be integrated into an existing cadence rather than added as a new event?
Is there a precedent for pulse surveys in this organization, and what tool would be used to deploy the Day +30 confidence survey?
How many total operations managers and plant locations are in scope — this affects print quantities and whether communications need site-specific customization?
